'''Phlogiston Unit''' refers to 3 identical [[Quest Item]]s obtained during the {{Quest|In Search of a Hidden Heart}}. One is obtained through each of the following sub-quests:
* [[Where Once There Was a Calculation Array]]
* [[Where Once Force Was Reversed]]
* [[Where Once There Were Arms Aplenty]]
